按.definition: to press; to push; to leave aside or shelve; to control; to restrain; to keep one's hand on; to check or refer to; according to; in the light of; (of an editor or author) to make a comment

按下.definition: to press down; to press a button

按下葫蘆浮起瓢.pinyin: àn xià hú lú fú qǐ piáo
按下葫蘆浮起瓢.definition: solve one problem only to find another cropping up

按兵不動.definition: to hold back one's troops without moving (idiom); to bide one's time

按圖索驥.definition: lit. looking for a fine horse using only a picture (idiom); fig. to do things along rigid, conventional lines; to try and find sth with the help of a clue

按捺不住.definition: to be unable to hold back

按揭.definition: a mortgage (loanword via Cantonese); to buy property on a mortgage

按時.definition: on time; before deadline; on schedule

按照.definition: according to; in accordance with; in the light of; on the basis of

按理.definition: according to reason; in the ordinary course of events; normally

按理說.definition: it is reasonable to say that...

按說.definition: in the ordinary course of events; ordinarily; normally

按讚.definition: to give sb a thumbs-up (on social media)

按質定價.definition: to fix a price based on quality (idiom)

按部就班.definition: (idiom) to follow the prescribed order; to keep to the working routine

按鈕.definition: to push a button; button (one that can be pressed to trigger an action)

按鍵.definition: button or key (on a device); keystroke; CL:個|个[ge4]; to press a button
